protocol.name: P-GSE16469-2
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 50% Bleach and 0.1% Tween for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water. Seeds were stratified at 4ËšC for 2 days before being planted on standard media. Standard media is 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 0.5g/L MES, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 5.7 with KOH. Nylon mesh was placed on top of the solidified media and seeds were evenly placed on the mesh in two rows. About 1cm long root tips were harvested and placed in the protoplast solution as described in Birnbaum et al. (2005) Nat. Methods. GFP expressing protoplasts  were isolated from Fluorescence Activated Cell Sorter to collect total RNA.

protocol.name: P-GSE16469-3
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown vertically for 6 days at 22 degree under 16 hours of day and 8 hours of night.

protocol.name: P-GSE16469-4
protocol.text: RNA was extracted using the RNAeasy Micro Kit (Qiagen GmbH)

protocol.name: P-GSE16469-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA was prepared using the two-cycle amplification protocol by Affymetrix.

protocol.name: P-GSE16469-6
protocol.text: Samples were submitted to Expression Analysis Inc. (Durham, NC) for hybridization to Affymetrix ATH1 microarrays.

protocol.name: P-GSE16469-7
protocol.text: Samples were submitted to Expression Analysis Inc. (Durham, NC) for hybridization to Affymetrix ATH1 microarrays.

protocol.name: P-GSE16469-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method.
